metadata.job_title: Senior Data Engineer – Commerce Data Pipelines

seniority_level.evidence: Title includes 'Senior' and the posting requires 3+ years of data engineering experience.

job_family.evidence: Title and responsibilities focus on building and maintaining ETL pipelines and data models.

sub_specialty.evidence: Mentions Airflow (batch orchestration), Snowflake/Redshift data warehouses, and ETL pipeline development.

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of people‑management responsibilities or direct reports; role is focused on technical delivery.

primary_cloud.evidence: Redshift is an AWS service and is listed as a required skill; Snowflake is commonly run on AWS as well.

secondary_clouds.evidence: No other cloud providers (Azure, GCP, etc.) are mentioned in the posting.

processing_paradigm.evidence: Airflow orchestration and ETL pipeline work imply batch processing; no streaming technologies are referenced.

orchestrator_category.evidence: Airflow is explicitly listed as a required ETL orchestration tool.

storage_layer.evidence: Snowflake and Redshift are data warehouse solutions; no lake or lakehouse technologies are mentioned.

remote_restriction.evidence: Location restriction to Seattle, WA; Santa Monica, CA; or NYC, all within the United States, with a hybrid onsite/remote model.

timezone_focus.evidence: Allowed locations span West and East Coast US cities, indicating a focus on American time zones.

relocation_required.evidence: The posting does not mention a relocation package; candidates must already be in one of the specified cities.

h1b_friendly.evidence: Work authorization text explicitly excludes H1B visas.

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: OPT and CPT are explicitly excluded in the work‑authorization statement.

citizenship_required.evidence: Accepts green card holders, US citizens, and other valid EADs; no citizenship‑only requirement.

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Rate is stated as "Up to $92.5/hr on W2" and explicitly says no C2C or 1099.

benefits_level.evidence: The posting does not list any benefits such as health, PTO, equity, or learning budgets.

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No language about career growth, promotion tracks, or advancement opportunities is present.

mentorship_signals.evidence: The description does not reference mentorship programs, mentors, or learning from senior staff.

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No mention of promotion, advancement, or career ladders.

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: The posting does not discuss internal transfers or mobility within the company.

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks (IC, management, specialist, architect) are referenced in the posting.

requirement_strictness.evidence: A clear set of must‑have hard and soft skills is listed with only one nice‑to‑have skill (Nifi).

scope_definition.evidence: The responsibilities focus specifically on data engineering tasks without blending other roles.

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: The required skill set aligns with a senior data engineer role and does not appear overly demanding for the stated 3+ years of experience.
